definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Many Arab states have already begun to open embassies in Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 許多阿拉伯國家已經開始在巴格達建立使館。

sentences.english: The security guard of the apartment did not enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy.
sentences.chinese: 公寓保安人員沒有進入韓國駐華使館領事部。

sentences.english: Bin Laden daughter hides in Saudi embassy in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 拉登女兒擺脫伊朗軟禁，躲入沙特大使館。

sentences.english: Located in Lufthansa Area, near the 3rd embassy area.
sentences.chinese: 位於燕莎區域，鄰近第三使館區。

sentences.english: About one-third of them occupy Embassy Row.
sentences.chinese: 其中的三分之一都分佈在這個“使館街”。

sentences.english: The U. S. embassy, meanwhile, was in damage-control mode.
sentences.chinese: 美國大使館，同時，是在損害控制模式。

sentences.english: Counselor Yao Wenliang and Consul Li Zhuang from the Chinese Consulate General were present.
sentences.chinese: 使館參贊堯文良和領事李壯等在座。

sentences.english: I am from Tianjin. Do I have to apply in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 我是天津人，簽證一定要到北京大使館嗎？

sentences.english: Has that North Korean citizen enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy?
sentences.chinese: 那名朝鮮人是否已進入韓國使館領事部？

sentences.english: Min'an Jie No. 16, Dongzhimen, Across from the Russian embassy.
sentences.chinese: 民安街16號，東直門，俄羅斯大使館對面。

sentences.english: For more details please contact your nearest Brunei Embassy or diplomatic representative.
sentences.chinese: 請向您附近的汶萊大使館或領事館查詢最新詳情。

sentences.english: The Gourmet Week is hosted by SAS Hotel and co-sponsored by the Chinese embassy in Latvia .
sentences.chinese: 美食周由薩斯飯店主辦，中國駐拉脫維亞大使館協辦。

sentences.english: The red flag is flying high in the Chinese Embassy in Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐蘇丹大使館，五星紅旗高高飄揚。

sentences.english: We were still at the legation at Eaton Place.
sentences.chinese: 我們當時還在伊頓廣場的公使館。

sentences.english: On Saturday Chinese demonstrators gathered at the Japanese Embassy once again.
sentences.chinese: 星期六中國示威者再次在日本大使館門前聚集。

sentences.english: The fees have to be paid in Renminbi according to the relevant consular exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 簽證費必須以人民幣支付，以使館匯率爲準。

definition: to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to end a relationship/to break off diplomatic ties
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
abbr. for 國際關係學院|国际关系学院[Guo2 ji4 Guan1 xi4 Xue2 yuan4], University of International Relations, Beijing
